thread.title: College football picks Week 6: Utah or Cal? Make your picks
thread.title_full: College football picks Week 6: Utah or Cal? Make your picks | OregonLive.com

author: Joel Odom | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: College football picks Week 6: Utah or Cal? Make your picks
text:
Congratulations to Don Harbaugh of Damascus, our Week 5 winner of the Top 15 College Football Pick Off, who picked 12 of 15 games correctly last week. Here's the leaderboard after Week 5 .
Now, it's on to Week 6.
In the Top 25, the top matchups are No. 5 Utah taking on No. 23 California, and No. 13 Northwestern visiting No. 18 Michigan. In the Pac-12, the Oregon Ducks play host to Washington State, while the Oregon State Beavers head to Arizona, and Washington visits No. 17 USC.
Portland State looks to bounce back after its loss to North Dakota, as the Vikings go on the road for a game at North Texas.
The picks are now open for all 15 games, so head over and make your picks before the first game on the slate, Washington at No. 17 USC at 6 p.m. Thursday.
The contest: You're invited to join and play our 2015 Top 15 College Football Pick Off game for a chance to win weekly prizes and the grand prize of a $500 gift card.
How it works: Each week, we'll choose 15 of the week's most intriguing college football matchups. Simply pick who you think will win the game, and then check back after the games to see how you did. Make your Week 6 picks before the first game kicks off at 6 p.m. Thursday. (But don't worry, even if you don't get your picks in before the first game kicks off, you can still play.)
Prizes: The prizes are presented by Bi-Mart. Weekly prizes are $50 gift cards. The grand prize is a $500 gift card, second place is a $200 gift card and third place is a $100 gift card.
So make your picks, invite your friends and then sit back and watch some college football.
